splash_content.title: DISCOVER THE BEST FEATURE OF THIS RELEASE

articles.title: 🔥 New installation wizard
articles.desc: The step by step guide on first installation has been greatly simplified.

articles.title: 🔥 [WordPress] ACF integration
articles.desc: We added a new integration with Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) for WordPress. You can now use ACF fields in your AcyMailing templates.

articles.title: 🔥 [Joomla] New contact integration
articles.desc: You can now synchronize you Joomla contact with AcyMailing.

articles.title: 🔥 [Joomla] Contact email override
articles.desc: You can now override the contact email using AcyMailing override feature.

articles.title: 🎁 ElasticEmail integration updated
articles.desc: The ElasticEmail integration has been updated to use the version 4 of their API. It should improve the sending speed when attachments are on the sent emails.

articles.title: 🎁 Security checks improved
articles.desc: We improved the security checks on file uploads: new rules and verifications when uploading a new template and removed unused code on the add-ons menu.

articles.title: 🎁 List edition improvmements
articles.desc: The list edition page is now divided in 3 parts to gain performance on the page loading time

articles.title: 🎁 REST-API improvements
articles.desc: You can now specify more mail parameters when creating a follow-up via the REST API

articles.title: 🧩 Installation process improved
articles.desc: We adapted the AcyMailing code to better match the Joomla package guidelines. This should make smoother installations and updates and a better handling of plugin dependencies.

articles.title: 🧩 Contact synchronization
articles.desc: You can now synchronise your Joomla! contact creation with the creation of AcyMailing user.

articles.title: 🧩 Contact email override
articles.desc: You can now override the email sent via the single contact email form in front-end

articles.title: 🧩 Improve multi-site compatibility
articles.desc: On WordPress multisite, we fixed the issue when a super admin created a new site, he could not access AcyMailing on it

articles.title: 🧩 Fixed Divi compatibility
articles.desc: Fixed compatibility issue with Divi Supreme Pro plugin breaking select fields

articles.title: 🛠 Auto-save feature style
articles.desc: The text blocks can now be edited and dynamic content have the correct styling when applying the auto-save version of an email.

articles.title: 🛠 PHP notices
articles.desc: We removed some notices when using the mass actions for the first time.

articles.title: 🛠 Migration list access rights
articles.desc: The v5 data migration could break in some cases depending on the lists access rights, it has been fixed now.

articles.title: 🛠 Click map compatibility
articles.desc: The click map is now compatible with links tracked using Google Analytics in the statistics of an email.

articles.title: 🛠 hcaptcha integration
articles.desc: Fixed an issue that could occur when submitting a form with hCaptcha

articles.title: 🛠 Multiple subscription forms
articles.desc: Fixed an error when multiple subscription forms type popup are displayed on the same page
